DOC.detailed_description: Development atrioventricular ( AV ) conduction system abnormalities require placement permanent pacemaker ( PPM ) know complication transcatheter aortic valve replacement ( TAVR ) . Male gender , pre-existing AV conduction system abnormality , transient AV block intra-procedurally , use self-expanding valve associate increase risk AV block need permanent pacemaker placement . Persistent AV conduction abnormality document approximately 15 % patient receive Edwards Sapien valve , 4 % require permanent pacemaker placement . 22-28 % patient receive CoreValve require permanent pacemaker placement study . In one study , 78 % patient underwent His bundle electrogram assessment CoreValve placement transient persistent AV conduction system abnormalities procedure . Pacemakers place The Heart Hospital Baylor Plano produce two manufacture : Medtronic , Inc. St. Jude Medical , Inc. Each manufacturer pacemaker algorithms design minimize right ventricular pacing . Medtronic 's algorithm refer `` MVP '' ( Managed Ventricular Pacing ) , St. Jude Medical 's algorithm refer `` VIP '' ( Ventricular Intrinsic Preference ) . Each technique purport reduce unnecessary right ventricular ( RV ) pace novel pacemaker algorithm . Both manufacturer ' pacemaker programmer remote monitor system allow demonstration percentage ventricular pacing perform device . DOC.criteria: Patients > 18 year age Patients undergoing Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement Indication PPM include : 1 . Persistent 3rd degree AVB 2 . Transient 3rd degree AVB 3 . New Left BBB 4 . New bifascicular block 5 . New first degree AV block 6 . Any conduction disturbance determine investigator relate TAVR procedure 4 . Patients receive postTAVR PPM one follow device a. Medtronic : i. ADAPTA DR ADDR01 ii . ADAPTA L DRADDRL1 iii . ADVISA MRIA2DR01 b. St. Jude Medical : i. Zypher 5820 ii . Zypher 5826 iii .
